variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependencies.name: perl-cache-cache
dependencies.description: Extends Cache::SizeAwareMemoryCache

dependencies.name: perl-carp-assert
dependencies.description: Carp::Assert - executable comments.

dependencies.name: perl-class-load
dependencies.description: A working (require "Class::Name") and more

dependencies.name: perl-data-uuid
dependencies.description: Globally/Universally Unique Identifiers (GUIDs/UUIDs)

dependencies.name: perl-digest-jhash
dependencies.description: Perl extension for 32 bit Jenkins Hashing Algorithm

dependencies.name: perl-hash-moreutils
dependencies.description: Provide the stuff missing in Hash::Util

dependencies.name: perl-json-maybexs
dependencies.description: Use Cpanel::JSON::XS with a fallback to JSON::XS and JSON::PP

dependencies.name: perl-list-moreutils
dependencies.description: Provide the stuff missing in List::Util

dependencies.name: perl-log-any
dependencies.description: Bringing loggers and listeners together

dependencies.name: perl-module-mask
dependencies.description: Pretend certain modules are not installed

dependencies.name: perl-moo
dependencies.description: Moo - Minimalist Object Orientation (with Moose compatibility)

dependencies.name: perl-moox-types-mooselike
dependencies.description: Some Moosish types and a type builder

dependencies.name: perl-moox-types-mooselike-numeric
dependencies.description: Moo types for numbers

dependencies.name: perl-string-rewriteprefix
dependencies.description: Rewrite strings based on a set of known prefixes

dependencies.name: perl-task-weaken
dependencies.description: Ensure that a platform has weaken support

dependencies.name: perl-test-class
dependencies.description: Easily create test classes in an xUnit/JUnit style

dependencies.name: perl-test-deep
dependencies.description: Extremely flexible deep comparison

dependencies.name: perl-test-exception
dependencies.description: Test exception-based code

dependencies.name: perl-test-warn
dependencies.description: Perl extension to test methods for warnings

dependencies.name: perl-time-duration
dependencies.description: Rounded or exact English expression of durations

dependencies.name: perl-time-duration-parse
dependencies.description: Parse string that represents time duration

dependencies.name: perl-timedate
dependencies.description:
The parser contained here will only parse absolute dates, if you want a
date parser that can parse relative dates then take a look at the Time
modules by David Muir on CPAN.

dependencies.name: perl-try-tiny
dependencies.description: Minimal try/catch with proper preservation of $@
